architectural_elements.name: Stone or Concrete Walls
architectural_elements.description: Damp, moldy walls with cracks, water stains, and peeling plaster.

architectural_elements.name: Wooden Beams
architectural_elements.description: Exposed, rotting wooden beams on the ceiling, covered in cobwebs and dust.

architectural_elements.name: Stone or Tiled Floor
architectural_elements.description: Cracked, uneven flooring with stains, puddles of water, or mysterious dark spots.

architectural_elements.name: Small, Barred Window
architectural_elements.description: A grimy, barred window letting in minimal light, with condensation or frost on the glass.

architectural_elements.name: Wooden Door
architectural_elements.description: A heavy, creaking door with rusty hinges, possibly slightly ajar or difficult to open.

furniture_and_decor.name: Washbasin
furniture_and_decor.description: A large, chipped stone or metal basin filled with murky water and floating debris.

furniture_and_decor.name: Washing Board
furniture_and_decor.description: A wooden washing board with rusty metal ridges, placed near the basin.

furniture_and_decor.name: Clothesline
furniture_and_decor.description: A rope strung across the room with tattered, half-dried clothes hanging from it.

furniture_and_decor.name: Wooden Crates
furniture_and_decor.description: Stacked crates filled with soiled linens, broken bottles of soap, or rusted irons.

furniture_and_decor.name: Ironing Board
furniture_and_decor.description: An old, rickety ironing board with a rusty iron placed on top.

atmospheric_details.name: Cobwebs
atmospheric_details.description: Thick cobwebs draped across the ceiling, corners, and furniture.

atmospheric_details.name: Dampness
atmospheric_details.description: Visible moisture on the walls and floor, with puddles forming in certain areas.

atmospheric_details.name: Flickering Lights
atmospheric_details.description: A single lantern or candle casting weak, flickering light, creating long, shifting shadows.

atmospheric_details.name: Ghostly Sounds
atmospheric_details.description: The sound of dripping water, distant splashing, or whispers from unseen figures.

atmospheric_details.name: Cold Drafts
atmospheric_details.description: Sudden chills, especially near the washbasin or window, with visible breath in the air.

interactive_objects.name: Stained Laundry
interactive_objects.description: Piles of laundry with mysterious stains, some shaped like handprints or symbols.

interactive_objects.name: Rusty Key
interactive_objects.description: A key hidden in a soap dish, under a pile of laundry, or inside a crate.

interactive_objects.name: Broken Pocket Watch
interactive_objects.description: A pocket watch left on the washbasin or hidden in a crate, tied to a puzzle.

interactive_objects.name: Handwritten Note
interactive_objects.description: A note tucked into a pocket of a garment or pinned to the clothesline, hinting at the room's dark history.

interactive_objects.name: Hidden Compartment
interactive_objects.description: A loose floorboard or a false bottom in a crate, containing a small artifact or clue.

environmental_effects.name: Drafts
environmental_effects.description: Clothes on the clothesline or curtains moving as if pushed by an unseen force.

environmental_effects.name: Fog
environmental_effects.description: A thin layer of mist near the floor, especially around the washbasin or window.

environmental_effects.name: Water Stains
environmental_effects.description: Dark, mysterious stains on the floor or walls, hinting at past events.

environmental_effects.name: Falling Dust
environmental_effects.description: Dust or lint drifting down from the ceiling or shelves.

lighting.name: Moonlight
lighting.description: Faint moonlight filtering through the barred window, casting eerie shadows.

lighting.name: Lantern Light
lighting.description: A dim, flickering lantern hanging from the ceiling or placed on a crate.

lighting.name: Ghostly Glow
lighting.description: A faint, eerie glow emanating from the washbasin or puddles on the floor.
